attributes.action: Allow the people a Referendum to draw a close the Coronavirus Act 2020.
attributes.additional_details: The infection rate seems to have increased due to more testing but the death rate (actual death from the virus - not having the virus present when passing from other illnesses)is very low especially in people under 60yrs of age. The recovery rate for healthy people is high. Allow the people to decide whether they want to take the chance of contracting the virus and recovering. Or suffer the implications of out of control spiralling debt and poverty, lack of healthcare and poor mental health.
attributes.background: Great financial damage has been done to the United Kingdom’s economy from lockdowns during Coronavirus Pandemic, the death rate has reached a low plateau after the peak at the beginning of the Pandemic.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551539
